item.description:
Join us as we celebrate the 3rd anniversary of our meet up group! We are going back to the place where it all started- John Harvard's in Shopper's World, Framingham for dinner and drinks. If you are new to meet up or haven't been in a while, this would be the perfect event for you to attend. Come and celebrate all the fun we have had for the past 3 years and all the good times that are yet to come!

Everyone pays for their own food/drink. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

Look forward to seeing you there!

Attendance note: Meet Up has removed the "maybe" sign up option. In order to have an accurate headcount, if you are unsure about attending, please write "maybe" in the note section when you sign up. If you can not attend, please be sure to change your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Dinner and Celebration of our Meet Up Group's 3rd Anniversary!
